body: Waiting for the day this get translated 😔

The 3rd story (Minarai Zouhyou) was just plan stupid! I do enjoy the NTR where the stealers are working together to break up the main couple (Guy cause he just wants a new toy, Girl cause she wants BF to be HER BF) But this one was just so stupid with the GF falling for the girl's "oh he's blackmailing me" and the assholes "take her place and I MIGHT let her and you go" (when it's plan as day he won't! I know we won't get a story if the girl did to the logical thing and call the cops/authority. But I'm not a fan of "idiot balls" when their so blunt like this!) Well at least BF got himself a "devoted girl" (even if she's a slut because asshole and her are sex-friends! I guess she has something on him to assure that fact never gets back to "her new BF" with consequences if asshole doesn't take his new toy after she's devastated when BF becomes "ex-BF" and never approach Yandere again! It will be "their little secret!")

@Blankroom Well in the comment section on E-hentai of this someone granted your wish (the 2nd story "Mogiki hayami" one). She's pretty much getting tied up and raped! BF gives off Yandere like vibes, so she fucked up by not stopping when she should have! The commenter said Mogiki was doing something DIFFRENT this time then the previous one where the guy let the cheating wife go! Frankly if the BF in this one is yandere! Who's to say he WON'T ruin the cheating GF "married ex-BF" life! Can't have him "trying to pretend to be concern" when he notes her ignoring him (Hell he can twist GF into screwing ex over to save herself cause he could be fine with just giving the guy's wife the evidence he has...risking her getting sued for compensation... Or screw him over and only he suffers the consequences with a "Chance" of her getting out of this situation with her reputation intact and "maybe" BF letting her go..which is obvious he won't after that! He wants her to hurt ex like she hurt HIM!)

@Azrael2020: Not much. Only about celebratory edition for managing to survive until 10th volume without getting axed. Contributing artists mentioned for vol 10: Nanao Yukiji. Syuuen. Kanimura Ebio. Yuuzu Tsushiro. Himino.
On comic gucho 10 there is nanao yukiji..... But the image is twin mother incest... Does anybody knows what the letters is saying?

IF that 2nd story has a 2nd part I'm not getting my hopes up anything different than he generic MC gets a cuck fetish and just ties himself up. Last few two times where a story baited a revenge continuation it ended the exact same way and it was such a dissapointment hopefully not this time but fuck me that'd be great if the guy rapes the shit out of her tied up and ruins her job and other guys life exposing his affair to his wife.
